descriptions.business: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Full features with unlimited usage

highest.body: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] You are already on the highest tier!

verifiedToast.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Domain Verified
verifiedToast.body: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Domain {{domain}} has been successfully verified!

domainErrors.spaces: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Domain cannot have leading or trailing spaces
domainErrors.format: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Please enter a valid domain format (e.g., example.com)
domainErrors.duplicate: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] This domain has already been added

delete.heading: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Are you sure you want to delete your account?
delete.description: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] This action cannot be undone. All your data, conversations, and settings will be permanently deleted.
delete.listItems: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] All your conversations and chat history,Your account settings and preferences,Any uploaded files and documents,Your subscription and billing information
delete.confirmLabel: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] To confirm, type your email address:
delete.inputPlaceholder: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Type your email address here
delete.errorMismatch: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Please type your email address exactly as shown to confirm deletion.
delete.errorFailed: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Failed to delete account. Please try again.
delete.toastFailedBody: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] There was an error deleting your account. Please try again.
delete.toastSuccessBody: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Your account has been permanently deleted.

notifications.toastBody: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Your notification preferences have been updated

responses.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Responses
responses.description: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Get notified when ChatGPT responds to requests that take time, like research or image generation.

tasks.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Tasks
tasks.description: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Get notified when tasks you've created have updates.

toasts.settingsUpdated: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Your security settings have been updated

password.description: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Change your account password or reset it if you've forgotten it.

missing.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Missing fields
missing.body: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Please fill in all password fields

mismatch.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Password mismatch
mismatch.body: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] New password and confirmation do not match

weak.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Weak password
weak.body: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Password must be at least 8 characters long

success.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Password changed
success.body: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Your password has been updated successfully

reset.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Reset email sent
reset.body: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Check your email for password reset instructions

mfa.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Multi-factor authentication
mfa.description: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Require an extra security challenge when logging in. If you are unable to pass this challenge, you will have the option to recover your account via email.

toastEnabled.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] MFA enabled
toastEnabled.body: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Multi-factor authentication has been successfully enabled

disable.heading: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Are you sure you want to disable MFA?
disable.description: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Disabling multi-factor authentication will make your account less secure. You will no longer be required to provide a second authentication factor when signing in.
disable.toastBody: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Multi-factor authentication has been disabled

trustedDevices.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Trusted Devices
trustedDevices.description: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] When you sign in on another device, it will be added here and can automatically receive device prompts for signing in.

current.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Log out of this device
current.toastBody: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] You have been logged out of this device

all.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Log out of all devices
all.description: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Log out of all active sessions across all devices, including your current session. It may take up to 30 minutes for other devices to be logged out.
all.toastBody: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] You have been logged out of all devices

mfa.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Secure your account
mfa.instructions: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Scan the QR Code below using your preferred authenticator app and then enter the provided one-time code below.

codeRequired.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Code required
codeRequired.body: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Please enter the verification code from your authenticator app

codeInvalid.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Invalid code
codeInvalid.body: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Please enter a valid 6-digit code

verifyFailed.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Verification failed
verifyFailed.body: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Invalid code. Please try again.

clipboardUnsupported.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Clipboard not supported
clipboardUnsupported.body: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Your browser does not support copying to clipboard. Please manually copy the code.
